H0.text: Who was the commander of the German sixth army which fought and lost the Battle of Stalingrad . Erich von Manstein

H1.text: Who was the commander of the German sixth army which fought and lost the Battle of Stalingrad . Heinz Guderian

H2.text: Who was the commander of the German sixth army which fought and lost the Battle of Stalingrad . Hermann GÃ¶ring

H3.text: Who was the commander of the German sixth army which fought and lost the Battle of Stalingrad . Von Paulus

A4.text: Paulus was given command of the 6th Army. He led the drive to Stalingrad but was cut off and surrounded in the subsequent Soviet counter-offensive.

A5.text: Paulus took over his new command only on 20 January, six days after the sudden death of Reichenau, leaving him on his own and without the support of his more experienced sponsor.
